Automation Explorer Training credential. Well done!

* Use hashtags that are commonly used in searches, such as

To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it:
Log in to Google Groups and click on My Groups seen in the left navigation pane. You will see the list of your groups. Choose the group ""NPTEL Newsletter""
Click the Leave Group icon on the right side to leave the group or you can choose the ""No email"" option under Subscription to stop receiving these emails.
To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to newsletter-announce+unsubscribe@nptel.iitm.ac.in.
"IEEE Membership"" <ieee@deliver.ieee.org>",What would you like to hear about?,"
Did you know you can join IEEE as a professional member or as a Student member?
Professional membership is open to individuals who by experience give evidence of competence in an IEEE designated field.

A Student/Graduate Student member must carry at least 50% of a normal full-time academic program as a registered undergraduate or graduate student in a regular course of study in IEEE designated fields.
Which type of membership are you interested in learning more about? Click the button below to make your selection.

[I want to learn more about becoming a Professional Member.](https://engage.ieee.org/Professional-Member-Selection.html?utm_source=mkto&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=learnmore&utm_id=entry&utm_content=email7)
[I want to learn more about becoming a Student Member.](https://engage.ieee.org/Student-Member-Selection.html?utm_source=mkto&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=learnmore&utm_id=entry&utm_content=email7)
Over the next few weeks, we will be reaching out with more information about the type of membership you are most interested in.
A not-for-profit organization, IEEE is the world’s largest technical professional organization dedicated to advancing technology for the benefit of humanity.
IEEE • 445 Hoes Lane, Piscataway, NJ 08854 USA

You are receiving this email because you signed up to learn more about becoming an IEEE member. To unsubscribe, update your [IEEE Communications Preferences](https://www.ieee.org/ieee-privacyportal/app/ibp?utm_source=mkto&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=learnmore&utm_id=entry&utm_content=email7). Users without an IEEE Account can access the [Privacy Portal](https://www.ieee.org/ieee-privacyportal/app/managePreferences?utm_source=mkto&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=learnmore&utm_id=entry&utm_content=email7) to view selected preferences and policies.
